timeline.message:
[JBPM-9196] configure port in properties

Signed-off-by: ruromero <rromerom@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: This is just to make tests more stable? As I think that the KIE Server runs on 8080, so the conflict shouldn't be happening. Although from other tests/modules it can...
timeline.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText: the build log also shows some cargo problems with starting the service or something before ProcessMigrationIntegrationTest
replies.author: mareknovotny

replies.bodyText: Yeah, that would signal that something before wasn't properly stopped. But still a good precaution to use a very different port.
replies.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText: I can't explain why I can't reproduce it locally. My only guess is that maybe some other service is using port 8180 or that certain ports are not allowed.
replies.author: ruromero

replies.bodyText: Yes, I think it can also happen if the jenkins slave is reused after the previous run wasn't successfully finished etc.
replies.author: MarianMacik
